books.author: Daniel Quinn
books.description: Man answers a personal ad in the newspaper and is taken on a journey through the faults of mankind, told to him by an ape named Ishmael

books.author: Chloe Benjamin
books.description: Siblings find out when they are going to die and the book follows each of their lives up until their death date

books.author: William Powers
books.description: Author lives off the grid in a 12 x 12 cabin for a full year and learns way too much about himself

books.author: Maria Semple
books.description: Woman loses here mind after architect carrer goes up in shambles, runs away, finds her calling again
